casebody.data:
CENTRAL VERMONT RAILWAY COMPANY, Plaintiff in Error, v. George B. HOWARD, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 20, 1925.) No. 321. See, also, 297 F. 566. J. W. Redmond, of Newport, Vt., for plaintiff in error. M. G. Leary, of Burlington, Vt., and H. C. Shurtleff, of Montpelier, Vt., for defendant in error.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
